'''Fungi''' are an enemy group. They are an evolved species of mushrooms with increased abilities to reproduce and protect the flora.<ref>Youtube: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JrC7DTUsii8 Sumeru Preview Teaser 03- Prelude to Wisdom - Genshin Impact]</ref>
